Every family needs an emergency evacuation plan.
You should know where to meet, how you'll get there and plan for an alternate route.
A proper evacuation plan can help get you...
...and your family to safety and avoid getting stranded.
Should a catastrophe separate you and your family,...
...it's very important to designate a contact outside of your area.
Your contact can be your connection to friends and family,...
...even if there's no way to contact each other directly.
